body.header: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: group words and phrases according to whether they relate to art, the cinema or theatre.
read a review of a play, a film and an art exhibition.
listen to people explaining a variety of terms related to national treasures and match each explanation to the appropriate word or phrase.
read a newspaper article about national treasures and complete it with appropriate words and phrases.
read an e-mail describing a theatre production and complete it with appropriate words.
